If you get stuck with this config, please open an issue or get in touch via the discord.
Here are some of the variables you may want to change:
PL_TARGET_DENSITY_PCT - Increase if Global Placement fails with error GPL-0302.
CLOCK_PERIOD - Increase this if setup time violations occur. (20ns = 50MHz)
Hold slack margin - Increase if hold violations occur.
RUN_LINTER, LINTER_INCLUDE_PDK_MODELS - Disabling the linter is not recommended!
Custom clock port - Make sure this matches your design
Enable KLayout DRC and XOR checks to verify design correctness.
Don't put clock buffers on the outputs
Reduce wasted space
Absolute die size
Allow congestion in global routing
Optimize routing and placement
Clock synthesis
Restrict to met4 to avoid forbidden met5 layer
Ensure VGND is not on met5
MAGIC_DEF_LABELS may cause issues with LVS
Only export pin area in LEF (without connected nets)
